about_the_game:
Hello and welcome !

I'm Mamat, a true passionate gamer and a new French game developer on Unreal Engine 5, and I present to you my first game : Shades !

These last few years many FPS were not really satisfying me, so I decided to make one by myself with all my ideas and my perspective of a truly immersive first-person game, which means no or minimum HUD/menus or camera effects and things popping up to your eyes, like in real life, and be really free to do whatever you want in dense and beautiful environments, no invisible walls, many destructions possible and no body block for example, using different ways to complete the objectives and find solutions to problems by yourself, no backseating, minimap or floating arrows/pings, and with that all the latest hardware and software technologies available on PC to have the most realistic graphics and physics for the best immersion possible.

I'm making this game first to gain experience (so please be indulgent), and to start a portfolio in game development, then hopefully in the future to change from my actual job to my dream job : being a game developer, or even better, create my own game studio, which really listen his community and who you can trust and rely on, to make all our dream games for all of us, I have so many ideas !

So based on your support, i hope this early access will give me the time and resources to make all this happen.

About Shades, it's a really immersive solo FPS with infiltration and tactical extraction shooter aspects. Go stealth, or loud, in a variety of missions as a mercenary for an agency that really use your skills to make this world better.

For now the game may not very optimized, so you will surely need a good and recent PC for the best experience (you can check the system requirements below), it may also lacks some content and functionalities, so be aware before buying then leaving a bad review please.

Currently implemented in the game, there are 4 different maps : your home/vehicle (upgradable), the secret training bunker of the agency, the agency test mission then your first official mission, with for now simple AI enemies, a money/level system, a tablet/PC with online casino games, shops, applications, dark web markets and more, 10 customizable weapons : sniper rifle, revolver, 2 assault rifles, 2 SMGs, 2 shotguns, 2 handguns + 4 grenades : fragmentation, contact frag, flash and smoke, several utilities/explosives, an axe, fist fighting and a push/kick/ragdoll system.

All along the development of the game, I plan to get it better optimized and to add more missions, more maps and environments, more weapons, explosives, utilities and gadgets, new mechanics, gameplays and vehicles, more customizations on loadouts, vehicles and homes, many destruction possibilities and physical interactions, a better AI, a cool horror gamemode, and an old school realistic skin system based on merit and grinding, not real money.

Since I'm new in game development and all by myself for now, I will take as much time possible to read and consider a maximum of all your suggestions, bugs reports and fixes to do, to improve my game and myself as much as possible.

So please I would very much appreciate if you have any good feedbacks to give me.

For that you have my X/Twitter and all my other socials linked on the right of this page.

The game price will gradually increase as it develops, so the earlier you buy it, the more you will save !

See you ingame or on Twitch/Youtube and don't forget to follow all my socials for more about the game and the latest news !

Have fun ! Bye !

Mamat

content_descriptors.notes: The game may include content that is not appropriate for all ages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits up to date
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 14600K or AMD Ryzen 5 9600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 4060 Ti 16GB VRAM or AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT (with drivers up to date)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: You need a good SSD (NVMe M.2 PCIe) and a good headphones/microphone setup for the best experience possible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 up to date
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 14700K or AMD Ryzen 7 9700X
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER or AMD Radeon RX 7900 XT (with drivers up to date)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: You need a good SSD (NVMe M.2 PCIe) and a good headphones/microphone setup for the best experience possible
